    pmplots

    Installation

    repos <- c("https://metrumresearchgroup.github.io/r_validated", options()$repos)

install.packages("pmplots", repos = unique(repos), type = "source", destdir = NULL)

    News

    News can be found here

    Vignettes

    • Get started

    • Residual plots
    • NPDE plots
    • Dependent variable plots
    • ETA plots
    • Vectorized plots

    Suggested packages

    Consider installing the cowplot package to help arranging plots on a page. Also, consider installing latex2exp to allow you to use latex in axis titles.
